name: Cyber Slider
author: CyberSourcepk

sections.description:
Cyber Slider is WordPress plguin to create slider for a site with many different options. It have Carousel option, Product Slider optoin and much more. The plugin have many setting options for admin.
For detail check the Demo .
Please post your question and suggestion.

Features:

  • Easy to install WordPress plugin
  • Translation Ready
  • Works with any standards compliant WordPress theme
  • Plays well with other Plugins
  • 100% Customizable
  • light Weight
  • Easy to modify templates
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. For Further detail setting please have a look on the documenation.
sections.faq:
Is Cyber Slider supporting a slider in widget area?

Yes, Please go to widget area and select the proper shortcode to see that slider in action.

Can I create multiple sliders at one time ?

Yes of course you can create as many slider as you like.

short_description: Cyber Slider is a WordPress plugin based on slick jquery. Plugin providing full page slider, product slider in widget are and normal slider.
